auto_reply_desc: After enabling, reply with specified content based on keyword reply and message received reply rules. Priority: keyword reply > message received reply
received_reply_tip: Automatically reply with corresponding message content for specified message types. Only one rule will take effect for the same message type. Priority: time settings > default reply
received_reply_tip2: Smaller numbers indicate higher priority. Priority is only effective when time conflicts occur. For example, if one rule is set for 1-9 AM and another for 3-10 AM, when triggered at 8 AM, only the rule with the highest priority will be triggered. After satisfying the time period, other rules will not be triggered within the time interval
col_priority_tip: Priority values cannot be duplicated. Smaller numbers indicate higher priority
col_enabled_tip_default: After enabling, trigger message type to reply with specified content
col_enabled_tip_time: After enabling, reply with specified content according to the set time period
msg_close_warning: After closing, keyword and message received replies will no longer reply with specified content
